translations: n．耻辱，不光彩：失去尊重或名誉的行为或情况。
v．玷污，败坏名声：使失去尊重或名誉。

sentences.sentence: He who does not honor his wife, dishonors himself.
sentences.translation: 不尊重妻子的人，自己也不会受到尊重。

sentences.sentence: It is out of fear that one dishonors earth, one another, and all other species.
sentences.translation: 就是在恐惧中你不尊重地球、不尊重彼此和所有其他物种。
